name: Western Mini Putt
description:
Western Mini-Putt is a golf game reminiscent of mini-golf, where player strife to
get the hole with the least number of strokes. Ideally get a Hole-In-One.

Western Mini-Putt is a 3D third person, isometric golf game. Where the
player is challenged to shoot towards the hole trying to get it in the hole in as few strokes as possible. With up to 9 holes varying in form and challenge presented to the player
